name: LitCommerce: Multi-channel Selling Tool For WooCommerce
author: LitCommerce

sections.description:
You can simply sell on TikTok Shop, Etsy, eBay, Amazon, Walmart and other channels with LitCommerce, a multichannel selling solution for WooCommerce. The most popular eCommerce platforms and Marketplaces may be easily and affordably integrated with WooCommerce by using this software. All you need to do to boost sales is maintain utilizing your WooCommerce site and add LitCommerce as a launch-ready technology!

Multichannel supported: Facebook, Google Shopping, Etsy, Amazon, eBay, Walmart, Wish, OnBuy, Reverb, TikTok Shop, Sears, Bonanza, Shopee.
You can list your items everywhere with LitCommerce:
– Add WooCommerce items to TikTok Shop
– Add WooCommerce items to Amazon
– Add WooCommerce items to eBay
– Add WooCommerce items to Etsy
– Add WooCommerce items to Walmart
and more!
LitCommerce also makes it possible for WooCommerce to link with other eCommerce giants like Shopify, Wix, BigCommerce, Squarespace etc.

Features

1. List and edit multiple listings
LitCommerce offers single-listing and multi-listing to manage all listings from WooCommerce to Marketplaces and edit listings more easily.
– Effortlessly list WooCommerce products in bulk on marketplaces.
– Access to mass editable Templates & Recipes and a spreadsheet-style user interface.
– By matching SKUs, link marketplace listings to WooCommerce products to prevent duplication.

2. Templates and Recipes
Utilize Templates and Recipes to quickly create your listing.
– Utilize Templates, which are sets of attributes and settings for listings, to quickly generate or modify your product listings. When a Template is modified, all listings to which it was applied are also updated.
– A Recipe is a set of templates for a particular channel for saving more of your time.

3. Import orders from Marketplace and fulfill them from your WooCommerce store
By continuously updating inventory counts after each transaction, LitCommerce prevents overselling and repetitive tasks.
– Import your Marketplace orders and manage them in your WooCommerce store.
– Update with tracking information for shipments across channels.

4. Use LitCommerce LiveSync to sync in real-time.
– Automatically sync in WooCommerce, and LitCommerce will update itself immediately on all sale channels.
– Create an instantaneous synchronization between your WooCommerce site and your sales channels for product listings, orders, pricing, and inventory.

WooCommerce integration in a few clicks

Step 1: To get started, you just need to simply download this plugin, install and enable it on your WordPress admin page. The plugin will automatically:
– Check if you have the WooCommerce plugin installed on your page and allow you to reconnect if already installed.
– Create a LitCommerce administrator user for seamless integration.
– Generate the correct API keys.
– Send the relevant data to LitCommerce to help sync your important e-store attributes.

Step 2: Integrate WooCommerce with your online sale channel(s)
Choose WooCommerce as your Main Store, and then connect one of your sale channels such as Etsy, Amazon, eBay, etc. The connection step is simple, intuitive and easy to follow.

Step 3: List WooCommerce products
Select products from your catalog to create draft listings before editing and publishing to sale channels.

Step 4: Sync price & inventory
Turn on real-time sync to update product attributes, price, quantity on your sale channels instantly.

Step 5: Import & fulfill your orders
All orders placed through sale channels are immediately received by WooCommerce for you to fulfill.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the litcommerce folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory or alternatively upload the litcommerce.zip file via the plugin page of WordPress by clicking ‘Add New’ and selecting the zip from your computer.
  2. Activate the litcommerce WordPress plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Now that the plugin is activated, you will see LitCommerce as an option in your WordPress sidebar. Select “LitCommerce” to go to the connection page and click “Connect to LitCommerce”
sections.screenshots:
1. Affordable to sell everywhere

  2. Sell everywhere in any currency

  3. Create and manage listings

  4. Template & recipes

  5. Import & fulfill orders

  6. Sync in real-time across sale channels
sections.reviews:
Great support - so far so good!

By joemarshalljm on April 15, 2024

I had a quick question and the live chat answered immediately, and then the agent guided me step by step through the whole set-up process. Amazing. I'm not even a paid subscriber (yet!) and it's the best support I've had for years.

LitCommerce is a great replacement for Codisto

By vivkiaustralia on April 15, 2024

I have just installed LitCommerce to replace Codisto. Codisto no longer supports WooCommerce after being bought by Shopify. LitCommerce offers a near identical service and is competitively priced. It also services more channels. Finally, support has been just fantastic. The support staff could not have been nicer and more helpful. I am now a big fan of LitCommerce and look forward to more channels and features. Five stars!

Attentive Support

By jmerchdesign on April 14, 2024

The chat support specialist Harvey was very helpful and attentive. The technical team seems to be good as well. Thanks!

Price/quality perfect fit!

By niqlaz on April 5, 2024

Good and easy App. Smooth and fast support.

Streamline Your Multichannel Product Listings Effortlessly

By megzapparel09 on April 2, 2024

LitCommerce is a game-changing application for e-commerce businesses looking to expand their reach across multiple online platforms. This app simplifies the process of managing product listings on various channels such as TikTok Shop, Shopee, and other stores. It offers a user-friendly interface that allows users to seamlessly transfer product listings from their main store to different channels with great ease.

One of the standout features of LitCommerce is its ability to centralize product management, making it convenient for businesses to update and synchronize product information across different platforms in real-time. This not only saves time but also ensures consistency in product listings, ultimately enhancing the overall customer experience.

The intuitive design of LitCommerce makes it easy for users to navigate through the app, even for those who are new to multichannel selling. The step-by-step process of listing products on various platforms is well-guided, ensuring that users can efficiently complete the task without much hassle.

While LitCommerce currently supports popular platforms like TikTok Shop and Shopee, one feature that users are eagerly anticipating is the integration with Lazada. The addition of Lazada integration would further enhance the app's versatility and widen the reach of businesses to tap into a larger customer base.

In conclusion, LitCommerce is a powerful tool for e-commerce businesses looking to streamline their multichannel product listings. With its user-friendly interface, seamless product management capabilities, and potential for future integrations, it is a valuable asset for businesses seeking to optimize their online presence and drive sales across various platforms. I highly recommend LitCommerce to any business looking to enhance their e-commerce operations and expand their reach in the digital marketplace.

Excellent Service, very helpful and patient. Highly recommended!

By disaustralia on April 2, 2024

Step by step walk through on the whole setup process. very easy and understandable.

well worth it

By myexercise on March 29, 2024

great customer service and price and easy to use. Just do note that variations need to be linked exactly bu no issue sorting that out (had to be done anyway). Great value for money

serious and professional people

By enricoolmeda on March 29, 2024

Even though I haven't bought a subscription yet, I asked for a change to the system and in a very short time they contacted me and implemented the program.
Professional, kind and competent people.
it's a pleasure to work with them

Great Plugin

By angelcandelaria on March 27, 2024

Very easy to use and configure. Support is very responsive. Thanks for such a great plugin that works smoothly.

Great product

By dvdst on March 27, 2024

Works for importing my eBay listings into WooCommerce, when I sell something it's synced and removed instantly from the other. Support is great.

short_description: Bulk List/Sync your WooCommerce Products and Orders with biggest online marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, Etsy, TikTok Shop, Walmart, Facebook, etc.
